mapper.select: select a.prod_id as id, a.product_name as productName, a.product_type as category, b.name as categoryName, a.providers_id as providersId, c.provider_name as providersName from tbl_product a left join tbl_product_class b on a.product_type=b.product_type_id left join tbl_providers_info c on a.providers_id=c.providers_id where b.type=#{productType} and c.serviceType=1 LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product ( product_name, product_intro, product_pic, product_type, providers_id, order_no, sts, CREATE_DATE ) value ( #{productName}, #{profile}, #{imgId}, #{category}, #{providersId}, #{orderNo}, #{state}, now() )
mapper.select: select prod_id as id, product_name as productName, product_intro as profile, product_pic as imgId, product_type as category, providers_id as providersId, order_no as orderNo from tbl_product where prod_id=#{id}
